subject: Re: purples
author: psi_research
full_text:
Ken, the mantis head beings also appear purple. The color image halfway 
down the page is similar to what I witnessed along with several other 
people during a meditation excercise that was the lead in to a 
dimensional portal building workshop.

 Frank, when you mentioned the "purples" to me while I was in CO, I 
immediately thought of my experience but your description was 
different. My encounter was with a mantis head being.

Regards, Bill Murphy

p.s. we've been operating and recording some box sessions. During our 
first sessions, the box seemed to be calling your name like it did when 
we visited you. Through verbally stated intention, I communicated that 
you have provided me with the box for continued research. Our last two 
sessions began by my name being announced by the box. It's almost as if 
the spirit technicians (or etheral beings) now recognize my energy 
signature being imprinted in this particular box.

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Ken Thomas <kennnthomas2000@...> wrote:
>
> http://www.unknowncountry.com/news/?id=6132
>
